CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 11, 1953, page 11, reads: "At The Dance - A general view of the dancing at the Holy Cross Parish Council's Easter Monday dance held at the Fort Pitt Hotel. A gala affair it drew several hundred guests to the first annual event. It will soon be a MUST on your social calendar. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Men and women dancing at the Holy Cross Parish Council's Easter Monday dance, including couple in foreground on left, man wearing plaid jacket, and woman holding dark handbag on left arm, in interior of the Fort Pitt Hotel with ornate wood paneling and several large wall sconces
